授業目的: The objective of this course is to examine basic elements of management and give students an introductory view of what management means and what roles of managers are in profit oriented organizations. It covers broad elements that need to be managed, including organization, strategy, organizational design and organizational behavior. Students will examine logic and practical difficulty of management through text, case studies, in-class discussions and individual research report.
到達目標: Students will examine basic elements of management and will learn an introductory view of what management means and what roles of managers are in profit oriented organizations.
